hero.name: Emanuele Toma
hero.subtitle: I craft efficient web solutions and robust infrastructure, bridging the gap between development and automation.

skills.title: Skillset
skills.subtitle: Technologies I work with
skills.additionalInfo: My broad experience across frontend, backend, and infrastructure gives me a well-rounded perspective on the entire development lifecycle. This allows me to effectively plan and implement solutions that meet project needs from start to finish.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: I create responsive, accessible, and performant user interfaces using modern frameworks and tools.

backend.title: Backend
backend.description: I build scalable server-side applications and APIs with robust architecture and database design.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: I design and manage cloud infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and containerized deployments.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of projects I've worked on

items.name: Termcord
items.description: A terminal-based frontend for Discord, built for developers who prefer command-line interfaces.

items.name: OverLLM
items.description: An overlay application to interact with any LLM, both local and API-based, providing seamless AI integration.

items.name: Axios Tor
items.description: An easy-to-use library to connect Axios HTTP client to the Tor network for anonymous requests.

items.name: codicefiscale.dev
items.description: An API service for validating Italian tax codes (Codice Fiscale) by querying the Agenzia delle Entrate.
Development of frontend projects in Cloud and On Premise environments and AWS infrastructure management.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained React-based user interfaces
Implemented TypeScript for enhanced code quality
Designed and maintained AWS cloud infrastructure

items.description: Intensive program focused on modern cloud development practices and emerging technologies.
responsibilities: Mastered CI/CD pipeline development and automation
Learned containerization with Docker and orchestration
Studied machine learning and deep learning with Python
Built applications using React, Vue, Angular, and React Native
Worked with NoSQL databases like MongoDB

contact.collaborationText: I'm always interested in hearing about new opportunities and projects. Whether you're a company looking to hire, or you have a project idea you'd like to discuss, feel free to reach out!

about.title: About Me

intro.description: who loves creating efficient, scalable solutions that bridge the gap between development and operations.

description.fullStack: With experience across the full technology stack, I enjoy working on everything from crafting responsive user interfaces to designing robust cloud infrastructure. My approach combines modern development practices with solid engineering principles.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Building responsive, accessible web applications with modern frameworks like React, Next.js, and Astro.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.description: Creating scalable APIs and server-side applications using TypeScript, Node.js, and various databases.

devops.title: DevOps & Infrastructure
devops.description: Designing and maintaining cloud infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and containerized deployments.

about.personalTouch: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or learning about the latest developments in AI and cloud computing. I believe that great software is built by people who are passionate about what they do and never stop learning.
